https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9ESIHBpfZKKLJ0KM2h1SwxPzew7.jpg Counting Bullets tells the story of a small group of cavalry soldiers who are pinned down in a canyon by the enemy. Over the course of a few days, they are forced to face their differences and rely on each of their instincts to survive. Counting Bullets
